mineru-api-pdf: Get the results of PDF extraction tasks from the MinerU API
markdown-epub: Convert Markdown files to EPUB e-book format
key: A powerful document processing toolkit that transforms PDF documents into various formats using advanced AI-powered extraction technology. This toolkit is designed for users who need to convert PDF documents into editable and structured formats without requiring technical knowledge.
if-the-folder-does-not-exist-an-empty-ar: If the folder does not exist, an empty array is returned here
key2: E-book title (optional, defaults to file name)
epub2: EPUB theme style (optional, defaults to Duokan style)
key4: Cover image file path (optional, no cover by default)
mineru-api-pdf2: Extract text, tables, and formula content from PDF files using the MinerU API, with support for exporting in multiple formats.
pdf-url-pdf-doc-docx-ppt-pptx-png-jpg-jp: The URL address of the PDF file supports formats such as .pdf, .doc, .docx, .ppt, .pptx, .png, .jpg, .jpeg, etc.
mineru-api-token2: MinerU API Token, apply for and obtain it from the official website.
id2: The data ID corresponding to the parsed object, used to uniquely identify business data (optional).
2-4-6: Specify the page range in a comma-separated string format, such as: "2,4-6"
docx-html-latex: Additional export formats, optional: docx, html, latex
callback: Random string, used for the signature in callback notification requests (must be provided during callback).
pdf-epub: Convert PDF files to EPUB e-book format
mineru-api-token3: MinerU API Token, apply for and obtain it from the official website.
key8: E-book title (optional, defaults to file name)
epub4: EPUB theme style (optional, defaults to Duokan style)
ocr2: Whether to enable the OCR function
pdf-epub2: Convert PDF files to EPUB e-book format
mineru-api-token4: MinerU API Token, apply for and obtain it from the official website.
ocr3: Whether to enable the OCR function
extract-and-convert-files-from-a-folder-: Extract and convert files from a folder into a unified markdown document
array-of-file-paths-to-process-returns-e: Array of file paths to process. Returns empty array if folder doesn't exist
maximum-character-limit-for-text-extract: Maximum character limit for text extraction (500-10000)
retrieve-task-results-from-mineru-api-wi: Retrieve task results from MinerU API with retry mechanism
unique-identifier-for-the-task-to-retrie: Unique identifier for the task to retrieve
convert-markdown-files-to-epub-format-wi: Convert markdown files to EPUB format with customizable themes and metadata
input-markdown-file-to-convert-to-epub: Input markdown file to convert to EPUB
output-path-for-the-generated-epub-file: Output path for the generated EPUB file
extract-content-from-pdf-documents-using: Extract content from PDF documents using MinerU API with OCR and advanced parsing capabilities
url-to-pdf-file-or-supported-document-pd: URL to PDF file or supported document (PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, PNG, JPG, JPEG)
enable-ocr-optical-character-recognition: Enable OCR (Optical Character Recognition) for text extraction
enable-mathematical-formula-recognition-: Enable mathematical formula recognition and extraction
enable-table-structure-recognition-and-e: Enable table structure recognition and extraction
mineru-processing-model-version-pipeline: MinerU processing model version (pipeline or vlm)
document-language-for-optimal-text-recog: Document language for optimal text recognition
callback-url-for-task-completion-notific: Callback URL for task completion notifications
random-seed-for-reproducible-extraction-: Random seed for reproducible extraction results
preprocess-and-validate-pdf-files-before: Preprocess and validate PDF files before extraction, generating cover images
convert-pdf-documents-to-epub-format-wit: Convert PDF documents to EPUB format with AI-powered text extraction and customizable themes
input-pdf-file-to-convert-to-epub: Input PDF file to convert to EPUB
output-path-for-the-generated-epub-file2: Output path for the generated EPUB file
maximum-retry-attempts-for-api-calls: Maximum retry attempts for API calls
extract-and-convert-pdf-documents-to-str: Extract and convert PDF documents to structured markdown format with intelligent content parsing
input-pdf-file-to-convert-to-markdown: Input PDF file to convert to markdown
directory-to-save-the-extracted-markdown: Directory to save the extracted markdown files
maximum-retry-attempts-for-api-calls2: Maximum retry attempts for API calls
